Metadata.title: Improve email deliverability and land in the inbox
Metadata.description: Warm up new email accounts gradually, monitor sender reputation, and ensure your cold emails reach prospects' inboxes.

taglines: Automatically warm up domains with real engagement patterns
Build sender reputation with AI-generated natural conversations
Reach the inbox with intelligent email warmup sequences

SectionHero.headline: Improve email deliverability and land in the inbox every time
SectionHero.paragraph: Warm up new email accounts gradually, monitor sender reputation, and ensure your cold emails reach prospects' inboxes.

SectionPricing.label: Pricing
SectionPricing.headline: A pricing that adapts to your needs

questions.question: How long does email warmup take?
questions.answer: EmailWarmup typically takes 2-4 weeks to fully warm up a new email account. Our system gradually increases sending volume and engagement to build a positive sender reputation with email providers.

questions.question: Will this work with my email provider?
questions.answer: Yes, EmailWarmup works with all major email providers including Gmail, Outlook, custom domains via SMTP, and popular email automation tools like SendGrid and Mailgun.

questions.question: How do you measure deliverability?
questions.answer: We send test emails to seed accounts across major providers and track inbox placement rates, spam folder rates, and overall deliverability scores in real-time on your dashboard.
